game.desc: Show your friends and enemies who owns the place in this beginner-friendly fighting game! !!! You can press LEFT and RIGHT on the character select screen to change a player into AI !!! In development! Please follow my itch.io! MONSTER BATTLEGROUNDS Welcome to Monster Battlegrounds (MBG)! Pick your Monster and defeat your foes in battle! MBG is a 1 versus 1 fighting game with simple controls and deep mind-games.
